JP Morgan reports Q2 earnings
SEC investigates JP Morgan
JP Morgan upgrades Apple to Buy
Goldman Sachs stock falls 3%
Goldman Sachs recommends Microsoft
Investors sue JPMorgan
JP Morgan initiates coverage on Tesla
Barclays raises Amazon target
Regulators fine Goldman Sachs
UBS downgrades Meta
Rating agency upgrades JP Morgan
JP Morgan raises Nvidia price target
Goldman Sachs upgrades shares of Apple to 'Buy' with a price target of $210.
Goldman Sachs lowers target for Amazon to $145, maintains 'Neutral' rating.
Goldman Sachs initiates coverage on NVIDIA with a 'Buy' recommendation.
Goldman Sachs boosts stake in Tesla, now holds 2.5 million shares.
Goldman Sachs increases target on Meta Platforms to $400 in latest note.
Goldman Sachs adds Microsoft to Conviction Buy list.
JPMorgan raises price target on Alphabet to $180, keeps 'Overweight' rating.
JPMorgan adds Netflix to its top picks list with a target of $500.
JPMorgan boosts position in AMD by 30% during Q2.
JPMorgan reiterates 'Overweight' rating on Salesforce with new $320 price target.
Citigroup raises Apple price target to $200, citing strong iPhone demand.
Barclays upgrades Uber to 'Overweight' with a target of $72.
UBS initiates coverage on Airbnb with 'Buy' and $165 target price.
Credit Suisse lowers Shopify target to $68, maintains 'Neutral' stance.
Wells Fargo increases stake in Zoom Video Communications by 15%.
Morgan Stanley raises Nvidia target to $1500 amid AI demand surge.
Goldman Sachs Group reduced their price objective on shares of Brixmor Property Group from $33.00 to $29.00 and set a “buy” rating for the company in a report on Thursday, May 1st.

Goldman Sachs Group Inc. boosted its stake in Covenant Logistics Group by 161.8% during the first quarter. Goldman Sachs Group Inc. now owns 179,304 shares of the company’s stock valued at $3,981,000 after buying an additional 110,810 shares during the last quarter
Shares of GE Vernova Inc.hit a new 52-week high during mid-day trading on Monday after Citigroup raised their price target on the stock from $354.00 to $544.00
JPMorgan Chase & Co. upped their price objective on Synchrony Financial from $52.00 to $80.00 and gave the company an “overweight” rating in a report on Friday, July 11th.
The Goldman Sachs Group increased their price objective on Synchrony Financial from $70.00 to $78.00 and gave the stock a “buy” rating in a research report on Wednesday, July 2nd.
Goldman Sachs Group decreased their target price on shares of Venture Global from $20.00 to $17.50 and set a “buy” rating for the company in a research note on Wednesday, May 14th.

Venture Global’s (NYSE:VG – Get Free Report) lock-up period will expire on Wednesday, July 23rd. Venture Global had issued 70,000,000 shares in its public offering on January 24th. The total size of the offering was $1,750,000,000 based on an initial share price of $25.00. Shares of the company owned by company insiders and major shareholders will be eligible for trade following the end of the lock-up period.
